# CloudLoggingOption

`CloudLoggingOption` contains additional settings for Cloud Logging logs generated by Batch job.

## Properties

Name | Type | Description | Notes
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
**use_generic_task_monitored_resource** | **bool** | Optional. Set this flag to true to change the [monitored resource type](https://cloud.google.com/monitoring/api/resources) for Cloud Logging logs generated by this Batch job from the [&#x60;batch.googleapis.com/Job&#x60;](https://cloud.google.com/monitoring/api/resources#tag_batch.googleapis.com/Job) type to the formerly used [&#x60;generic_task&#x60;](https://cloud.google.com/monitoring/api/resources#tag_generic_task) type. | [optional]

```python
from openapi_client.models.cloud_logging_option import CloudLoggingOption

# TODO update the JSON string below

```
